events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and received the wrong item. I want to return it and get a full refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under refunds due to the customer's request to return the wrong item and receive their money back.
A customer support agent specializing in refunds has been assigned to handle this case to provide a prompt resolution.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with the return and refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so I can verify the issue and proceed with the return?
Sure, my order number is 456789 and I have attached a photo showing the item that arrived, which is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will send you a prepaid return label and once we receive the incorrect item, we will process a full refund to your original payment method.
That sounds good, thanks for the quick help. I’ll wait for the return label to arrive via email.
The return label has been sent to your email. Please use it to return the wrong item and we will ensure your refund is processed promptly after receipt.
We are checking in to confirm that you have successfully returned the item and to let you know that your refund is being processed.
The refund has been issued to your original payment method. We are closing this case now but please reach out again if you need any further assistance.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to your email. Please share your feedback to help us improve our service.
